attributes.action: make it easier for people aged 19+ to continue their education through level 2 and 3.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the main problem for people aged 19+ is funding, i potition the prime minister to make it easier for people to continue their education. under 19 the education is free and over 25 you can go straight on and be assessed for university, without needing level 3 qualificatons,where it can be government funded and student loans gained for financial assistance. Hovever there is very little help for those between the ages of 19 and 25.
